offer: Save 28% on your flight for FIFA matches as a EBL user!
applicable: On Domestic and International Flight Bookings
terms: Applicable for domestic flight bookings.
For all EBL Visa debit & credit cards.
EBL Visa Credit Platinum & upper tier cardholders will get 3 times SKYCOINS.
EBL Visa Credit Corporate platinum cardholders are not eligible for the 3 times SKYCOINS benefits.
Up to 2,000 SKYCOINS per cardholder against each transaction.
Not applicable for internet banking and EMI.
In the event of any misuse or abuse of the offer by the customer, AirBliss reserves the right to deny the offer or cancel the booking.
